verses.verse: Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou the <S%H6256>time<s%> when the wild <S%H3277>goats<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>? Or canst thou <S%H8104>mark<s%> when the <S%H355>hinds<s%> do <S%H2342>calve<s%>?
Canst thou <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H3391>months<s%> that they <S%H4390>fulfil<s%>? Or <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thou the <S%H6256>time<s%> when they bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>?
They <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6398>themselves<s%>, they bring forth their <S%H3206>young<s%>, They cast <S%H7971>out<s%> their <S%H2256>pains<s%>.
Their young <S%H1121>ones<s%> become <S%H2492>strong<s%>, they grow <S%H7235>up<s%> in the open <S%H1250>field<s%>; They go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and return not <S%H7725>again<s%>.
Who hath sent <S%H7971>out<s%> the wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>? Or who hath <S%H6605>loosed<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds<s%> of the swift <S%H6171>ass<s%>,
Whose <S%H1004>home<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness<s%>, And the <S%H4420>salt<s%> land his <S%H4908>dwelling-place<s%>?
He <S%H7832>scorneth<s%> the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of the <S%H7151>city<s%>, Neither <S%H8085>heareth<s%> he the <S%H8663>shoutings<s%> of the <S%H5065>driver<s%>.
The <S%H3491>range<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> is his <S%H4829>pasture<s%>, And he <S%H1875>searcheth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> every green <S%H3387>thing<s%>.
Will the <S%H7214>wild-ox<s%> be <S%H14>content<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3885>thee<s%>? Or will he abide by thy <S%H18>crib<s%>?
Canst thou <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H7214>wild-ox<s%> with his <S%H5688>band<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrow<s%>? Or will he <S%H7702>harrow<s%> the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> after <S%H310>thee<s%>?
Wilt thou <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H3581>him<s%>, because his strength is <S%H7227>great<s%>? Or wilt thou <S%H5800>leave<s%> to him thy <S%H3018>labor<s%>?
Wilt thou <S%H539>confide<s%> in <S%H7725>him<s%>, that he will bring home thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, And <S%H622>gather<s%> the grain of thy <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>?
The <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H5965>ostrich<s%> wave <S%H7443>proudly<s%>; But are they the <S%H84>pinions<s%> and <S%H2624>plumage<s%> of <S%H5133>love<s%>?
For she <S%H5800>leaveth<s%> her <S%H1000>eggs<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And <S%H2552>warmeth<s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>,
And <S%H7911>forgetteth<s%> that the <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H2115>crush<s%> <S%H7704>them<s%>, Or that the wild <S%H2416>beast<s%> may trample <S%H1758>them<s%>.
She dealeth <S%H7188>hardly<s%> with her young <S%H1121>ones<s%>, as if they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3018>hers<s%>: Though her labor be in <S%H7385>vain<s%>, she is without <S%H6343>fear<s%>;
Because <S%H433>God<s%> hath <S%H5382>deprived<s%> her of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, Neither hath he <S%H2505>imparted<s%> to her <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
What <S%H6256>time<s%> she lifteth <S%H4754>up<s%> herself on <S%H4791>high<s%>, She <S%H7832>scorneth<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%>.
Hast thou <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> his <S%H1369>might<s%>? Hast thou <S%H3847>clothed<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> with the quivering <S%H7483>mane<s%>?
Hast thou made him to <S%H7493>leap<s%> as a <S%H697>locust<s%>? The <S%H1935>glory<s%> of his <S%H5170>snorting<s%> is <S%H367>terrible<s%>.
He <S%H2658>paweth<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, and <S%H7797>rejoiceth<s%> in his <S%H3581>strength<s%>: He goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the armed <S%H5402>men<s%>.
He <S%H7832>mocketh<s%> at <S%H6343>fear<s%>, and is not <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>; Neither turneth he <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
The <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H7439>rattleth<s%> against <S%H3851>him<s%>, The flashing <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H3591>javelin<s%>.
He <S%H1572>swalloweth<s%> the <S%H776>ground<s%> with <S%H7494>fierceness<s%> and <S%H7267>rage<s%>; Neither <S%H539>believeth<s%> he that it is the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>.

As oft as the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H1767>soundeth<s%> he <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>! <S%H1889><s%> And he <S%H7306>smelleth<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, The <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%>, and the <S%H8643>shouting<s%>.
Is it by thy <S%H998>wisdom<s%> that the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> <S%H82>soareth<s%>, <S%H6566>(And<s%>) stretcheth her <S%H3671>wings<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%>?
Is it at thy <S%H6310>command<s%> that the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> mounteth <S%H1361>up<s%>, And <S%H7311>maketh<s%> her <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H7311>high<s%>?
On the <S%H5553>cliff<s%> she <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%>, and maketh her <S%H3885>home<s%>, Upon the <S%H5553>point<s%> of the <S%H8127>cliff<s%>, and the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%>.
From thence she <S%H2658>spieth<s%> out the <S%H400>prey<s%>; Her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>behold<s%> it afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
Her young <S%H667>ones<s%> also suck <S%H5966>up<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: And where the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H1931>are<s%>, there is she.
